title: Six Deals You Need To Know In Australia Today
text:
Image: Supplied

G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 87% off bestselling protein supplements, cheap NBN 100 plans from MyRepblic, save big on Seagate's 8TB IronWolf NAS and more!

1. Bevilles Watches & Diamonds sale: Bevilles is having a big clearance sale on watches and jewellery via its eBay store with a massive 70% off select items. Click here!

2. 87% off Protein Supplements: So, you've seen our Lazy Man's guide to building muscle and want to kick things up a notch. Catch has knocked up to 87% off protein supplements including popular brands like Musashi, Balance, Muscletech and ON. Click here!

3. Cheap NBN 100 plans: MyRepblic has smashed the price of its NBN 100 plans to $79.95 - down from as much as $99.95 a month. The catch is that the price jumps to $89.95 after the first six months. But that's still a very competitive price. Click here! You can also see the inclusions below:

4. $10 Beauty & The Beast Blu-ray: Did you know the live-action Beauty & The Beast remake made $1.2 billion worldwide? The mind boggles. The Blu-ray version is currently going on Amazon for $10. Click here.

5. 35% off Philips Series 6000 Multi Precision Shavers: eBay has the Philips Series 6000 Multi Precision Shaver down to $158.11; a saving of over $90. To get the full discount, use the code 'PICKLE' at checkout. Click here!

6. Cheap 8TB Seagate NAS: Computer Alliance has the Seagate IronWolf 8TB NAS down to $287.20 which works out to around $35 per terabyte. To get the deal, use the discount code 'PCASAVE'. Click here!

Find more great bargains at Lifehacker Coupons.

As Lifehacker editors we write about stuff we like and think you'll like too. Lifehacker often has affiliate partnerships, so we may get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
description: G'day! Here are some cracking online deals for Lifehacker readers, including: 87% off bestselling protein supplements, cheap NBN 100 plans from MyRepblic, save big on Seagate's 8TB IronWolf NAS and more!...
